ComicInfo.Penciller: Bernard Baily,George Roussos,Jack Sparling,George Roussos,Jack Sparling,Bernard Baily
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wanted for Murder... 1966 ....6966: Criminal "Sparkler" Slade is captured by policemen from the year 6966 for a murder in that time. Though he tries to convince them they have the wrong man, it turns out that he is a double for the man they are really seeking, and his criminal double has also been captured for his crimes in 1966.
The Captives of the Time-Stone: Two paleontologists discover a strange crystal that transports various menaces from different eras of the past into the present.
The Supernatural Supermart: Nick Bragan schemes to steal artifacts from a museum by making it appear that an ancient curse is real, but when he encounters the Green Glob he is transported to a weird world where magic really exists and his life is in danger.
ComicInfo.Title: Wanted for Murder... 1966 ....6966; The Captives of the Time-Stone; The Supernatural Supermart
